meanings.definition: To alter or manipulate a photograph using software such as Adobe Photoshop.
meanings.sent1: She photoshopped her picture to remove the red-eye effect.
meanings.sent2: He always photoshopped his images before posting them online.
meanings.sent3: The cat photoshopped a hat onto its head in the photo.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were photoshopped by time, making them seem brighter than they were.
meanings.sent5: The artist photoshopped the landscape to create a surreal masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The act of digitally enhancing or editing a photograph.
meanings.sent1: The photoshopped image looked much better than the original.
meanings.sent2: She learned about photoshopping in her photography class.
meanings.sent3: The photoshopped picture made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: His skills in photoshopping made him popular among his friends.
meanings.sent5: The magazine cover featured a stunning photoshopped model.

meanings.definition: A photograph that has been edited or modified using software.
meanings.sent1: The photoshopped picture was shared on social media.
meanings.sent2: He could tell it was a photoshopped image because of the unrealistic colors.
meanings.sent3: The photoshopped photograph fooled many people into thinking it was real.
meanings.sent4: The photoshopped photo of the city skyline looked like a dream.
meanings.sent5: She proudly displayed her photoshopped family portrait in her living room.
